answers.answer: It is a fast, free track transfer from Ukraine to Romania via Moldova, providing safe and free transportation from the Ukrainian-Moldovan border to the Romanian border for all people fleeing the war.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Anyone fleeing the war in Ukraine can use the safe and free transportation services organized from the Ukrainian-Moldovan border to the Romanian border.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The free track transfer is supported by the UN Refugee Agency (UNHCR) and the International Organization for Migration (IOM), in coordination with the Romanian and Moldavian governments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The daily buses for the free track transfer depart from the Palanca border in Moldova and arrive in the city Huși in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The travel time for the free track transfer from Moldova to Romania typically takes 5-6 hours.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The free track transfer buses depart daily from the Palanca border.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: In Huși, people using the free track transfer can get free medical care, water, and food if required.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: From Huși, travelers can continue their journey by taking free buses to Bucharest or Iasi.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Regardless of nationality, anyone fleeing the war in Ukraine is eligible to use the free transportation services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
